column4: I'm displaying images from a camera with OpenGL via QT, both in windowed and fullscreen modes. I am getting large amounts of image tearing, which suggests that I need to enable VSync. On my OSX version, I do this with aglSetInteger(aglContext, AGL_SWAP_INTERVAL, &swapInt); On the Windows version, I am supposed to be able to do this with wglSwapIntervalEXT, when I test for the existence of the extension on Win7 x64 it's not there...
